sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams stong
pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa
nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye mched
drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi
gnas pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
dang | stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi
gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam
gtan stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam
par thar pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa
nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir
mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
ni/ gang yang gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so/ /rang bzhin
la rang bzhin mi gnas so/ /gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni/
gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis
rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de rjes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rjes su rtogs
nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de la'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ 'da' ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid dang /
yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ 'da' ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya gnyis pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar
chos kyi dbyings la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na/ ci lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du
byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'ang
gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
lags sam/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sgra'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dri'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ro'ang gzhan la/
chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ reg kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan| yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig

'du shes kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyang
gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/
sgra'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dri'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ro'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ reg
kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'i
rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos
kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
lags| rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan| de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ me'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rlung gi
khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan| de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'du byed
kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan| yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa
ma lags/ reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan| de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sred pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ len pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ srid pa'ang gzhan
la| chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ skye ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
gzhan| yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rga shi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ nang
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ don
dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
lags| ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos
kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos
kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mngon par
shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos
kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byams pa chen
po'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de
bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom
pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
gzhan| de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan pa ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas
dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni/ lha dang mi dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal
rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing / dkar pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnams par dgod pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni/
'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni/ rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha snyad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang /
gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden
par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci byis pa so so'i skye bo
rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni/ de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu'am| phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/ byis
pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa'ang med/ lam sgom pa'ang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod par lta ga las 'ong / rab
'byor| 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni/ lam yang yod/ lam sgom pa'ang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnams par dgod pa yod do/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lam bsgom pas 'bras bu thob pa'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyid ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de
ni| ma yin te/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/ lam gyis 'bras bu
'thob par bya ba'ang med do/ /lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa byed de/ 'dus byed kyi khams las/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par
dgod pa mi byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par
dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid
do| |gang ci'ang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma
mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on
te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor| 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
sems| gang gi tse rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/ de'i
tshe 'dus byas she'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes chos gang la'ang ris su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong

pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi
dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste sems can rnams
la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to/ /de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan dang po'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'am/ bsam gtan gsum
pa'am| bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/ byams pa'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ rnam
shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par
'jug pa'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams sam/ lam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa
rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/
byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la'ang chags pa med do/ /'di ltar dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
'da' ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems
can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med do/ /
gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du bzod sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la
chags pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam
gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su
mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /shes rab bsgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba
med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du shes rab sgom mo/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom yang zag
pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na
sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i chos rnams bsgom yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu
nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/ /'dus
byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bsgom yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba
med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la'ang gnas pa'am/ chags pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'di ltar des chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par sgrub pa dang / pha rol
tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ drug cu gsum pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya gsum pa/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan
nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sprul pa ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /bag la nyal ba
dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod
pa med do/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'du shes
la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mig la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rna ba la yongs su spyod
pa med do/ /sna la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lce la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lus la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /yid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzugs la yongs su spyod
pa med do/ /sgra la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dri la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ro la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /reg la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /chos la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mig gi
rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la
yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa
med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med
do| |sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /me'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rlung gi khams la
yongs su spyod pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su spyod
pa med do/ /ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod ba med do/ /
skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /len pa la yongs su
spyod pa med do/ /srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rga shi la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med
do| |bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /phyi
stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod
pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med
do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams
la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad
la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su
spyod pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs
su spyod pa med do/ /byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su
spyod pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/
de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbrul pas lam bsgom pa la
brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la rten te kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang
bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur
ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta
bu lags sam/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs thams cad ni/ sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba thams cad ni/ sprul pa lta bu'o/ /'du shes thams cad ni/ sprul pa lta bu'o/ /'du
byed thams cad ni/ sprul pa lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa thams cad ni/ sprul pa lta bu'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams
cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sprul
pa la ni/ gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma
mchis| gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin
rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha'am mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs
so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo / /rtogs so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo / /rtogs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags
na| gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa
lags| 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa lags/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa
lags| snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub
kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems
can rnams kyi don du bskal ba grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor/ sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta
bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams ci la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du
bskyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can rnams ni/ ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ming ni/ gang
lags| mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ mi bzhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur gyi ming gis sgro
btags pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs zhes bya ba'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba'am/ 'du byed
ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am/ bud med ces bya ba'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya
ba'am| byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ mi zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus
ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/
dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni/ sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor/ ming
ni| thams cad ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni/ ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni/ yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyi/ yongs su brtags pa
dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig /chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /zhes skul bar byed de/ rab
'byor| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /
gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags ba'am/ phra ba'am/ bzang ba'am/
ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas gzung ba ste/ 'di ni/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med
pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang la'ang rung ste/ mtshan mar gzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs ba skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni/ gzugs med
pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol
zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni/ mtshan ma'o/ /'di ni/ mtshan ma med pa'o/ /zhes bya ba gnyis su mi
ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems
can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol cing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ de tsam
du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing /
dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ gal te dngos po'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang med pa dngos po'ang med pas na/ rab
'byor| de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med ba'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs
par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs bar byed do/ /
mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan
ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma
med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i
tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i
tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan
ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes
pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs bar byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la
sbyor te/ rab 'byor/ gal te chung du na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin
nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa
med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad
kyi don byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing don pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di ltar 'di dag ni/ dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ mi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/
zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ zag pa med pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ thun mong gi chos
so| |'di dag ni/ thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /'di
dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan
thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma
med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/
mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor| mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub bo/ /
byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de de lta lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la
slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong

pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
dpag tu med pa de dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
bslab par bya bam gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mtshan ma dang bral ba ni/ mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/ smon
pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu
gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa
yin| tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
la slob pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba
bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob ba yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams
cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen
po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nye bar lan pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs
kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so/ /de la ji ltar na/ gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldang dang /
shin tu gse tshogs dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ gzugs shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni/
gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar
na| gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni/ mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med
kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /
de ltar na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/
de ltar na/ tshor ba shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni/ gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang bu rang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas
kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa
yin no| |ji ltar na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni/ mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam
par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin
nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyal chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'du shes shes pa yin no/ /ji
ltar na/ 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes ba yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni/ gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba
ste| gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang mas 'khor shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes
pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni/ mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba
ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin na/ /ji ltar na/ 'du byed
shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/ snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'du byed shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'du byed
kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni/ gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang
ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'du byed kya skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed
kyi de bzhin nyid ni/ mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs ba ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log
ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ rnam par shes
pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni/ gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang
du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ rnam
par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni/ mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par
byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'i de
bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni/ nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis
stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i
rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ro'i khams kyang ro'i
khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang
bzhin gyis stong ngo / /reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis
stong ngo / /yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /zhes bya bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ khams rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes
pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med
pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig ba ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar
na| rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung
ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal
shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni/ ma nor ba shes bya bar shes pa yin no/ /
de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te/ de ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang
mi dmigs so/ /gal te dmigs na ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'am/
rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs
pa'i chos gzhan no/ /zhes bya bar btags pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la
bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab
par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ chos thams cad la bslab par
'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
ni| de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings de ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang
bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor/ de
ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang / skye
mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji
ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab
par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab
par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji
ltar ngo bo nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam
par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par
bgyi| ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab
par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim
bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi
ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phrul dga'i ltar skye bar bgyi
ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi
ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i
lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bar bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par
bgyi| ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas
gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar
bgyi| ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing
der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab
par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad
pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyis la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji
ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi
lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab
par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba la
bslab par bgyi/ sna la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dri
la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par
bgyi| sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ me'i
khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/
'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la
bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
