pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab
par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med
pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab
par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab
par bgyi/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par
bgyi/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/ mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya
bzhi pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor
ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ mig las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /rna ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna
ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang lus so/ /yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs
kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra'ang chos kyi
dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri la chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud
na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
te| ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam
par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes
pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi
dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi
rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus
te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud
na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las
gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'o| |sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las skyed na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags| rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par
shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye
mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sred pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos
kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
te| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa
nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid

kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /
phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings

nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi
dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don
dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas
stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang

tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad
stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba
rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags| byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams so/ /lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos
kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshad
med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar
pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge
'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
byams pa chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po'ang chos kyi
dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /gzugs nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /
sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
chos so| |mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam
par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i
'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi

dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi

nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong
pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par

spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags ba'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang
byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/
gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni/ gzugs
zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'du shes zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'du byed ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig ces bya'o/ /'di ni/
rna ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ gzugs zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sgra zhes bya'o/ /
'di ni/ dri zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ro zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ reg ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chos zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes
bya'o| |'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes
bya'o| |'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /
'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ chu'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ me'i
khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /'di
ni| 'du byed ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ skye mched drug ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ reg pa zhes
bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sred pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ len pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ srid pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ skye ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid
ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di
ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ dbang po rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ stobs rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di
dag ni| gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag
ni| ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di dag
ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang byang chub ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o/ /zhes ston to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa
gyin zhig la brten te gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ ba lang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes
pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba'am/
rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba
dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/ glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'am/ tshul khrims
bsrung ba'am/ bzod pa bsgrubs pa'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba'am/ shes rab bsgoms pa'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo
dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan
tam| rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'phrul
dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun
'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/
kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan
tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi che ba'i
lha rnams bstan tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/
nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
mang pa bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /

chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod

pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su
rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su
rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis
rnam par brtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag
dang nying lags yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub
pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / snying rje
chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dgra bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di
snyam du sems te/ kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i/ re mdzes dag byed/ de ltar skye ba dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i
gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / bal lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal
dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i re ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa
dang / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa

dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam
par brtse ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /
khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / ri rab ston pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams
ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /
chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams ston
pa dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams ston
pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gya nom
snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
ston pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shas med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams ston pa dang / rgyun du zhugs
pa rnams ston pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams ston pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la

spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod
pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod

pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi

dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa
dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam
gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su gtong
ba dang / dka' pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /
sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin do/ /de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba
dang ldan pa/ dpyod pa dang dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni/ 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa
ni| ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /snyam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni/ dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o/ /zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas
pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul
khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod pa'i
legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan
yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa
yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/ gzhan
yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga'
bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan
lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa
yin| gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug
pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa
brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/
bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dga' ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la
snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang
dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang
dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs
pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag
par skul ba yin/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min
skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min
skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom
pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par
skul ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod
pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan
yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang stobs rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
can gzhan gang stobs rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa
yin| gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi
yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam
par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag
gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/
rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan
gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge
'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo
rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi
legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang
dag par skul ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa
brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa
bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas
dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan
gang snying rje chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par
skul ba yin/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ bar du'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi
'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du'ang de bzhin bas na de'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to/ /sems can rnams kyi don du
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa las/ mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u drug cu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya
gya lnga pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/
sems can du dmigs pa'ang ma mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor/ gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
gzhan ma lags/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal
te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas
pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god
pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par
'gyur ba'ang med na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'
la 'god de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin te/
de ltar na/ sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi
bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang /
dbus ston te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong / tha mi'o mtha' yang stong / dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong / sbyin bdag kyang stong / len pa'ang stong
par ston cing / rigs kyi bu/ de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyi/ sbyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no/ /snyam du ma sems shig /sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len
pa'ang gzhan no/ /snyam du ma sems shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod na ma sbyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no/ /snyam du mi sems/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa'ang
gzhan no/ /snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang / bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig /tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pas stong ngo / /
de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus stong ngo / /sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo / /len pa'ang len pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni/ sbyin pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
sbyin bdag dang / len pa mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo / /zhes brjod do/ /gzhan yang rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la bgod de/ tshur rigs kyi bu/ srog gcod pa spongs la/
srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /ma byin par len pa spongs la/ ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la/ 'dod
pas log par g.yem pa las phyin ldog bar gyis shig /brdzun du smra ba spongs la/ brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig /phra ma spongs la/ phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis
shig /zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ tshig 'khyal pa spongs la/ tshig 'khyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /chags sems
spongs la/ chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /gnod sems spongs la/ gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /log par lta ba spongs la log par lta pa las phyir
ldog par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ sems dang gang gi srog gcod par bya ba'i srog chags dang / srog
gcod par btags pa dang / gang gis srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byin par len par btags pa dang / gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i
chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yam par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos

kyang gang zhig yin/ gang brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang phra ma smra ba dang / phra ma smra bar
btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod bar btags pa dang / gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de
lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang / tshig 'khyal par btags pa dang / gang gis tshig 'khyal par smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang chags
sems bskyed pa dang / chags sems su btags pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang gnod sems bskyed pa
dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis
log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing / tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de
lta bu dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/ sbyin
pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas/
de la mngon par zhen pa mi byed do/ /mngon par zhen pa med pas/ 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do/ /shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams
cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi/ don dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa
zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing / 'khrugs par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na/ 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ bzod pas sgrubs shig /bzod
pa sgoms shig /des pa dang / sems zhi ba dang / nang du sems pa'i dang tshul can du gyis shig /gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par
bya ba'i chos de dag ni/ thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ gnod par byed pa ni/ su yod/ gnod par ni/ su la bya/ cis ni/ gnod par bya sems dang /
chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/ de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma
mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so/ /nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so/ /lha rnams kyis ma byas so/ /klu rnams kyis
ma byas so/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so/ /dri za rnams kyis ma byas so/ /lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so/ /nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so/ /
mi'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so/ /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga'
ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshang pa dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de ni/ rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /
rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni/ su la'ang gnod par mi byed do/ /zhes nas rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing / rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzang bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /gzhog go /'dul lo/ rab tu 'god do/ /de'ang
'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi/ don dam par ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang
med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de la sems can du dmigs pa med do/ /sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ sems can gyis dben
