skul ba byed do/ /kye skyes bu dag /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/ de la phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du
ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyi/ de lta bas na/ phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun
chod la 'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar par gyis shig /gzhan yang thar par gyis shig /de ltar na/ khyed bdag cag gi don du'ang cher 'gyur/ gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor par 'gyur
ro| |zhes yang dag par skul ba byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang
sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang / nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa
bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo / /zhes nas de 'di skad ces zer te/ su ci 'dod pa de
khyed la byin gyi/ 'di ni/ nga'i ma yin gyi/ khyed kyi'o/ /nga ni/ nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/ gzhan lta la ci smos te/ gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor
ba yongs su bzung gi /bdag ni/ 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no/ /zhes te/ de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi
don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na 'du shes dang / ming dang / brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod do/ /rnam par spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur
rnam par spyad du med par shes so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par
bya ste| spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par bya na/ phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs
su thar par bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ yo byad de dag gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/

yo byad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/

yo byad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /

chen po stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/

yo byad do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /rang

gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /dbang po rnams ni/ yo
byad do/ /stobs rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ yo byad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /
bsam gtan rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /tshad med pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni/
yo byad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ yo byad do/ /mngon
par shes pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /mi 'jigs pa
rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /byams pa chen po ni/ yo byad do/ /snying rje chen po ni/ yo byad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ yo
byad do| |de dag ni/ yo byad de/ yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po'am/
theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su spyad pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya go bzhi pa/ /rab
'byor| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab
'byor| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la 'di skad du tshur sheg /rigs kyi bu dag /tshul khrims
srungs shig /ngas khyed la zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang /
'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis yongs pa med par
bya'o| |khyed phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur grang na/ khyed zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /

phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang
ci'ang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'i/ de bas na/ khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la mnos la rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/ /tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan grang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi'ang legs
pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/
rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing
sems can gang khro ba dang / gnod sems su byed pa de dag mthong na de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/ gang gis phongs
shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dag de nga las long zhig /ngas khyed zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba

dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang
rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'i/ khro ba dang / gnod sems med par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /

sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/ 'di skad du/ gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni/ snying po med pa ste/ de la dngos po gang yang med do/ /khro ba de ni/ yang dag pa ma yin par
yongs su brtags pa ste/ dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon te gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang / de ltar 'thab cing 'khon te gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed

pa dang / mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang / phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/ de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/
sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi
bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su mong bar 'gyur gyi/ skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas
mir skye ba'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad par gyur pa lta smos su'ang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig /grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ dkon
no| |mir skye ba 'thob pa ni/ dkon no/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ dkon no/ /'khor ba las thar pa ni/ dkon no/ /de lta yin gyi/ dal ba 'di don med par ma bya zhig /mi khom par gyur
cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/ /gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /bzod pa'i legs
pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can
de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar zhing bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di skad du/ khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye skyes bu dag /ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/ tshul khrims kyi
rkyen tam/ bzod pa'i rkyen tam/ gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par bya'i/ brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /ces nas
sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/ /de dag bsgom pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/ /rang byang chub 'thob bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag
par skul lo/ /brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar zhing brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las
zlo ste| rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud
pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba
yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di skad du/ sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam
gtan la mnyam par mi 'jog ces brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'doms
te| kye sems can dag /ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/ de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas bsam gtan dang po la
snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /byams pa la snyoms
par 'jug go /snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go /dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go /btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par
'jug go /de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ /yang dag
par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ /dbang po lnga sgom mo/ /stobs lnga sgom mo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom
mo| |rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/ /de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ de la la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyams te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di skad du/ sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod
de| de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la 'di skad
du 'dems te/ nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig /tshul khrims srungs shig /bzod pa sgoms shig /brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
gzhog cig /rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ 'gro ba'am/ gso ba'am/
skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed can nam/ shed bdag gam/ byed pa po'am/ tshor ba po'am/ shes pa po'am/ mthong ba po'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du
byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi

stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/
yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'am| 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/
rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon
par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig
pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir
mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang yang yod dam
rtogs shig /ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang la dmigs pas mngon par zhen
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba pa'o/ /'di ni/ byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni/ lha ma yin gyi ris
su gtogs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lha'o/ /'di ni/ mi'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims ngan pa can no/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'o| |'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de
dag gis yongs su drin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/
de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ /
rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab
'byor| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag
par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag

yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams

lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya go lnga pa/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ kha zas dang / gos kyis phongs pa dag mthong na/ 'di
ltar yongs su sbyin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed tshur sheg /nga las zas dang / sgom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba

dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang
rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs shig /de ni/ khyed la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar don 'di ni/ pha rol po'i
yin gyi| bdag gi ma yin no/ /snyam bsam par bya'o/ /don 'di ni/ bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no/ /zhes de ltar khyed
kyis bdag gi yin par soms la/ sems can rnams la yongs su thong zhig /sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig /bzod pa la sbyor cig /brtson 'grus la sbyor cig /bsam gtan

la sbyor cig /shes rab la sbyor cig /nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /phyi stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /chen po stong pa nyid la
sbyor cig /don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /thog ma dang tha
ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la

sbyor cig /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig /dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor cig /yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor cig /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor cig /dbang po rnams la sbyor cig /stobs rnams la sbyor cig /byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor cig /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor cig /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor cig /bsam gtan rnams la sbyor cig /tshad med pa rnams
la sbyor cig /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor cig /rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor cig /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor cig /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor cig /mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor cig /ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyor cig /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyor cig /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor cig /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor cig /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor cig /byams pa chen po la sbyor cig/ snying rje chen po la sbyor cig /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sbyor cig /de tsam gyis dga' bar ma sems par gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa rnams la khod cig /'di lta ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
khod cig /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig /dgra bcom pa nyid la khod cig /rang byang chub la khod cig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub la khod cig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams
yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar pa nas 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs
su thar ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te sems can tshul khrims ngan pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs

su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang mi ldan pas khyed tshul khrims ngan pa byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyi/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me

tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang /
dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs shig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /de tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs
shing gnas te/ de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ ma god pa/ ma 'dres pa/ skyon med pa/ ma nyams pa/ rang dbang yod pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa'i ting
nge 'dzin gyi rgyur 'gyur ba la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la
gnas| stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
gnas| rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi
yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas/ tshad med pa bzhi la gnas/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can sems 'khrugs pa dang / gnod sems su gyur ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang mi ldan pas khyed
gnod sems su byed par gyur ba'i rkyen de dag ngas khyad la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba

dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang
rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long zhig ces nas de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/
de dag bzod pa sgom ste 'khrug pa med pa dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems su gyur ba de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don
dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la
gnas| rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/
rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
gnas| mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can le lo can brtson
'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed le lo byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyi/ zas dang / skom dang /

gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung
dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long zhig ces nas de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag brtson 'grus rtsom ste le lo med cing brtson 'grus rtsom par gyur ba de
dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid
la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa
stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa
brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon
par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so
so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid rjes su thob par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can sems g.yengs par gyur ba
dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed do/ /rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyi/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang /

bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man
shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long zhig ces nas de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag bsam gtan sgom ste/ sems g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa de
dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi
nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
gnas| 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/
ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ byams
pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum
las yongs su thar ba nas 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
sems can shes rab 'chal bar gyur ba blo chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la

bshugs kyi/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig

dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba rin po che snga bdun gyi bar du long zhig ces nas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ rmongs pa med cing / shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don
dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor
ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
gnas| 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par
thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/
mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
gnas| so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par
byed de| de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar ba nas 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa las/ /le'u drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i go cha
bgo bar bya na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab
'byor| bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang
tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab
'byor| rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
lam mo| |rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /
rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ dbang po lnga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /
rab 'byor/ stobs lnga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam
mo| |rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ tshad med pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par
thar pa brgyad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam
mo| |rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa
rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /
rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos thams cad
ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
bslab par mi bya ba dang / gang lam bslabs kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/ rab
'byor| gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang med de/ chos thams cad la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di snyed do/ /zhes bgyi ba'am/ 'di dag go/ /zhes bgyi
ba'am| 'jig rten pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ 'di
dag go /'dus byas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go /'dus ma byas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go /so so'i skye bo'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /dgra bcom pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go /byang chub sems dpa'i
chos ni| 'di dag go /sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba ni/ spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /
de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad
la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gzhan yang gang 'di
skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do/ /zhes bya ba'am/ 'di dag go/ /zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos
ni| 'di dag go /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /'dus byas kyi chos ni/ 'di
dag go /'dus ma byas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go /so so'i skye ba'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
chos ni/ 'di dag go /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /dgra bcom pa'i chos ni/ 'di dag go /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go /byang chub sems dpa' chos ni/ 'di dag
go /sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ 'di dag go/ /zhes bya bar chos rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rab 'byor/ ci sems can 'di dag gis de ltar chos thams cad stong ngo / /zhes bya
bar shes sam/ gal te shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/ rab
'byor| sems can 'di dag chos thams cad stong ngo / /zhes bya bar mi shes pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos rnam par dgod pa byas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas/ thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par 'di la chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med
do| |zhes bya bar yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de ltar rtog pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang
stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
dam| mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'am/ yang
dag par spong ba bzhi'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/ dbang po lnga'am/ stobs lnga'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi'am/ bsam gtan bzhi'am/ tshad med pa bzhi'am/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'am/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'am/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying
rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/
dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang la'ang mngon par chags par
mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/ /
stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ gang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par chos thams cad kyis rnam par spyod do/ /de bslab pa 'di la gnas shing sems can 'di dag ci la spyod ces sems can gyi spyod pa la
lta ste| de 'di snyam du/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa la spyod de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar
bya na dka' ba byed do zhes nas de'i tshe thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di skad du chos ston te/ /kye sems can dag tshur sheg /sbyin pa byin cig des
khyed longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur gyi/ longs spyod des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /de la snying po gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims la 'doms te/ kye sems can
dag tshur sheg /tshul khrims srungs shig /tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /de la snying po gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du bzod pa la 'doms te/ kye sems can dag
tshur sheg /bzod pa sgoms shig /bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /de la snying po gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du btson 'grus la 'doms te/ kye sems can dag tshur
sheg /brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /de la snying po gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'doms te/ kye sems can dag tshur
sheg /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cig /ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /de la snying po gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du shes rab la 'doms te/ kye sems can
