la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/
ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de la gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yod
dam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam
par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing
sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/ yang dag pa mthong ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med do/ /ji ltar
yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa
mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag pa ma mthong ba la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang
bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ de ni/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang
ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
par byang ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas
nyid dang / dbyings 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor/ rnam par byang ba ste/ de ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi/ de ni/ brjod du med cing smos
su med pa ste/ sgra dang / tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ mig
yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgra
brnyan lta bu dang / chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste/ dngos po
ma mchis pa/ rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /don dam pa
stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs
su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs
su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshad med pa
bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byams pa chen
po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi
rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par bya ste/ dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam
lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos de dag rmi lam
lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ sgra brnyan ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ mig yor ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ smig rgyu
ni| yang dag pa ma lags/ sgyu ma ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ sprul pa ni/ yang dag pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa ma lags pas/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po

med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang
dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyad pa
dang / snying rje chen po la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad
pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / gzungs
kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / byams pa
chen po la spyad pa dang / snying rje chen pa la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po sum brgya pa/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
sems| 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

smon pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /byams pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
mi rgya'o| |snying rje chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste/
'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ 'on kyang chos de dag ni/ thams cad kyang lam sgrub
pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni/ mtshan nyid med
pa'ang de yin te/ de lta bas na/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong
pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong
pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
dam| dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
sam| stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan
rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
sam| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa

nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas/ de'i phyir de lta bas na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bur
shes so| |mig yor lta bur shes so/ /smig rgyu lta bur shes so/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /
sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig
rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur
shes so| |sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyi stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / mig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes

bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes

nyid stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /

sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma

lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta
bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra

brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams rmi

lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe stobs rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul
pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta
bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu
dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rmi lam lta
bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam
gtan rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe tshad med pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /

sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang /
sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta

bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes

so| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /
sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang /
smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan
lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams rmi lam lta

bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur

shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang /

sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thams cad shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig

rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig
yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes
so| |sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi'am la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar
shes so| |sgra brnyan la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /mig yor la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /smig rgyu la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /sgyu ma la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /
sprul pa la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med
par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams
dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po
med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin
te| de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung
zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /

nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang
gzung du med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /
chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
gzung du med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /yang
dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /byang chub kyi
yan lag rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzung du med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang
gzung du med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
kyang gzung du med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang
gzung du med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /byams pa chen po'ang gzung du
med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang gzung du med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
gzung du med par shes par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ gzung du med cing dngos
po med pa ste/ rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma
gtogs par gzung du med pa'i chos kyis gzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don
du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du
gtong ngo / /tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsrung ngo / /bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang
sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go /shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems
can thams cad kyi don du bsgom ste/ bdag gi don du ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag
gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog med pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su
gnas pa dang / skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang zag med pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can med pa la shed
can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag med pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po med pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa
po med pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong ba po med pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po med pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du
shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po med pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor du 'jug pa po med pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa
po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyin ci log las
rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su 'god do/ /de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog
gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi
'du shes sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/
tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dor ba dang / spros pa 'di
dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la/ sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
du yin gyi don dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi/ don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba de
lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dmigs pa ste/
gnyis kyis ni/ gang yang thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis
na| gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba
med de| gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gang la gnyis kyang med la/ mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni/ thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa zhes
bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni/ thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/ spros pa med pa ni/ chos
mnyam pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
stsal pa| gang la dngos po med pa dang / dngos po med pa la'ang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos mnyam pa nyid po
de ni| brjod du med pa'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o/ /chos
mnyam pa nyid ni/ byis pa'am/ 'phags pa'am/ chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing / yul ma yin pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'am/
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang
mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do/ /de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa
nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni/ so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra
bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar
gnyis su bya ba med de/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni/ so so'i skye
bo'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /
'di ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs
pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos
thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste

chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i
slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid
kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon
mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon
mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs ma
mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni/ so so'i skye
bo'o| |'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor| de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na/ sems
can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ mi yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par

mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha
yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/

chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med che ba'i lha
yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ mi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba'i
lha yod par mngon nam/ 'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ cung zad med
pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon
nam| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi nang
stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par
mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba med pa stong
pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/
stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par
mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams yod
par mngon nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod par mngon
nam| mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par
mngon nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon
mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par
mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa
yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par
mngon nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos de dag thams cad ni/ mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ de ltar
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa/ /bam po sum brgya gcig pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid
las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos
mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa'ang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi
g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo
ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa
nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di
ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni/ dad
pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /

chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin

nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /
de nyid ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas

nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ rang
sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med
pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de las rnam par mi 'da'o/ /de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar so so'i
skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid
brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos
mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos
mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos
'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang /

dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes

pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang /
zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lte ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /

nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa

nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos de dag ni/
kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba/ gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos
nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/ mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
gzhan| rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te
reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang
gzhan| lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i
khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
gzhan| ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang

gzhan| gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang
gzhan| 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid
kyang gzhan/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid
kyang gzhan/ mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams
kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgod par ni/ ji ltar 'gyur/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/ chos
rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
sa las 'das te mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par brtse
bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/
dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang 'di
skad du| de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de
nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin
pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid
gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin
pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi
'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid
gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang
yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes
pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin bde nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang

stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam| ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir
mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang
yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin
pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/
tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i
mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i
mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid
dam| lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig

gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
dam| chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
dam| ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i

mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid

kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/
'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po

mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan
nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i 'das nyid dam/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs
sam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams
cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med/ so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/
de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang brgyad pa med/ brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med/ rgyun
du zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba las gud
na'ang de med/ de la'ang dgra bcom pa med/ dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med/
byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las
gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do/ /'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams
gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid
med pa'o/ /de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi/ don dam par ma yin te/ don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed med de/ lus
kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam pa dmigs su med do/ /'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin
pa de ni/ don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang yang ci'ang bgyid
pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing / ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gang la'ang ci la'ang byed pa'ang med/ ci'ang
mi byed pa'ang med de/ gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes
dang bral bar byed cing / bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'gro
ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gso ba'i 'du shes dang
