phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /
gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gang zag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can
gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
ba las 'grel ba dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang
bral bar byed cing / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral na stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa
po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
las 'grel ba dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed
cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i
'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / mig gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / sna'i 'du shes

dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lce'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
las 'grel ba dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / yid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi
'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel

ba dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dri'i 'du shes dang phral nas
stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ro'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar
byed cing / reg gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chos kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
las 'grel ba dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / sna'i rnam par
shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar
byed cing / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par
shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes
dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi
'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du
shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sa'i
khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid
kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rlung gi
khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed
cing | nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i
khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du
shes dang phral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ming
dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang phral nas
stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / tshor ba'i
'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / srid
pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang
phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
'grel ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa nyid yin yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor/ la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na de la
gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos
po gang yang ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ de gnyis ka'ang stong
pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i slad du 'di ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ sprul pa'o/ /zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcas par mdzad/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang /
sprul pa gnyis ka'ang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par
shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni/ stong pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir
'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i
chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sprul pa ste/ de la la la ni/ nyan thos kyis sprul
pa'o| |la la ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /la la ni/ byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni/ nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni/
las kyis sprul pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni/ sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams
cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bskyed pa'am/ bgag pa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni/ sprul
pa'o| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang la skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med pa de ni/ ma sprul
pa'o| |gsol pa/ de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni/ ma sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di skad du/ stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ gnyis su'ang mi dmigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do/ /zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi mnyam
pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang sprul par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa ste/ de dag
ni| nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis ma mdzad de/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par
'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor/ 'di la dngos po yong pa'ang med/ dngos po med pa'ang med/ ngo bo nyid kyang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa/ bam po sum brgya gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas/ gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye
mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi
skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par
shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar
bslab par bgyi/ mig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'du
byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar
bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can
gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchis pa dang / bstan du ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
'dus bgyis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / bsten par bgyi ba
dang / bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / ngan pa dang / gya nom pa dang / nang dang / phyi dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'das pa dang /
ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa dang rab
tu ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma lags pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang /
the tshom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson
'grus dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las
'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas/ gzugs
ming tsam mo/ /zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo/ /zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming
tsam mo| |zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe
'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming
'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste dngos po dang bcas par
dmigs pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming
tsam zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ dngos po ma mchis lags na/ de'i ming de'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung
lags te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba ni/ ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
zhes bgyi ba ni/ ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ glo bur du ming btags pa'o/ /'di lta
ste| sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar 'di'ang glo bur du ming btags pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des ming de rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur
la gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rtags pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
po de la glo bur du ming btags so/ /zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /
'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi
ming rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/ tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba
de dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar des ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba
dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan
ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags so/ /zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
byams pa/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la
gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming de la ma brtan/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di ni/ gzugs yin no/ /zhes bya bar de ji ga de snyam du sems sam/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /
'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di lta ste/
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming de la ma brten/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar la khyod ji ga de snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis
kyang 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de'ang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa yin
par de ltar rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ming dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la nye bar 'dogs
pa'am| tha snyad dam/ 'dogs pa'am/ mngon par zhen pa yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang /

'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur
du ming btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di la 'ga' zhig 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid la de las gzhan pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
por ming 'dogs sam/ 'du shes sam/ rjes su tha snyad 'dogs sam/ mngon par zhen par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ rnams grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/
gzugs zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni/ glo bur du
ming btags pa yin par de ltar reg par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
lags na ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes
bgyi ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang / 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ gzugs
kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/
'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang / 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa la/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de
gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/ btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ btags pa tsam du bas lags so/ /byams pa/ 'o na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
po la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o/ /zhes bya
bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags pa tsam du zad dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ btags pa tsam du bas lags so/ /byams pa/ 'o na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o/ /zhes bya bar khyod ji ltar de ji snyam du sems/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gzugs ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/ de lta na/
'di lta ste/ ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de lta na/ tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang /
tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ji ga skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
byams pa/ 'o na khyod 'di snyam du/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o/ /snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad
tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ji ga skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis lags
so| |bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'o na khyod 'di snyam du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o/ /snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams
pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci rnam pa thams
cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do/ /zhes nga mi
smra'o/ /byams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med
do| |zhes nga mi smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ gzugs mchis
pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/ don dam par ni/ ma
yin no| |byams pa/ 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar yod kyi/ don
dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyings 'di ni/ don dam par na brjod du ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te brjod du ma mchis
pa'i dbyings don dam par mchis su lags na/ 'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ don dam par mchis na/
'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du
'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/ 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni/ brjod du ma mchis
pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/
ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan
ma'i dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi dmigs lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams
pa| rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan

pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/ 'o na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye po thams cad
kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ gal te 'du byed kyi
mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na/ 'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa/
rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin la/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de
las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes
bgyi ba dang / tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar
dag gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs
lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni/ rang dbang nyid
dam| yod pa nyid gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de/
rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtogs par gzung
bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ de lta yin na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba

dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam
du ma zad dam/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/ /de de ltar rnam par mi rtogs pa'i dbyings la gnas te rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur ba na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba
zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags
pa de la yod pa gang yin gang yod pa ni/ dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu
rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags pa'i gzugs
so| |'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di
ni| chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun brtags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag
ni| kun btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags
pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni/ kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams kyi bar dag go /'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i gzugs ni/ gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs
ni| gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun btags
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni/ gang lags/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas
gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni/ kun brtags pa'i gzugs so/ /byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang /
tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni/ kun
btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go /'du byed kyi mtshan
ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas mngon par brjod de/ gang la 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba'o/ /zhes bya
ba dang / 'du shes so/ /zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so/ /zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du
shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes
so| |'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa 'di 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
bar dag go /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang
kun btags pa'i gzugs des rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa nyid dang / de
bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni/ chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid
kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su mchis par lta ba ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su
mchis pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye bar lta ba ni/ gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang /
rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su mchis pa dag ni/ gang lags/
rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni/ gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang kun btags pa'i gzugs de ni/ rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/ /rnam par btags
pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni/
rjes su med pa'ang ma yin/ rjes su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /gang kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rjes su med par blta bar bya'o/ /gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su
yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /byams pa/ gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams
pa| gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin la/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis
la| de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas
'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par
shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kun btags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de
gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gang
yin pa de ji ga gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis gang kun brtag pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin/
gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes
bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /
btags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma
lags so/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun brtags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing / de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa
gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang
ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ gnas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya
ba de ni| gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal bar rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs
de dag gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /chos nyid kyis gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs
kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa/ mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta
bu| spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di ltar dbu
ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang gzugs

spong ba'ang ma yin mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/ /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang
ma yin| mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/ /gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gang gzugs
spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa'ang ma yin/ mi sgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las
'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las
'das pa ni/ zab bo/ /mchog tu zab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ 'di ltar/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o/ /de
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan
las 'das pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzhan gyi don las brtsams te
'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don
las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/ de 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas/ 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang
chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na/ 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das
pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de
'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas/ mya ngan las
'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de/ rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang yongs su mi gtong
la| mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma
mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te blangs pa ma
mchis na/ ji ltar ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ nga ni/ 'di ltar 'khor ba len to/ /zhe'am/ mi len to/ /zhes mi smra'o/ /byams pa/ 'on
kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa/ thabs la mkhas pas 'khor
ba bstan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su
mi gtong ba'o/ /zhes nga mi smra'o/ /stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ zhes nga smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa

gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang / stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang /
dngos po med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma pa ste/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma pa'i 'jig
rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang / rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/ byams pa/ gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi

rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la/ de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid
nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la/ dman par shes nas de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/ de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs
kyi bye brag de lta bu'ang yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| sems can rnams kyi rigs kyi rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang skye ba ma
mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ sgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/
de'i skye ba las dang / nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar ni/ nga mi 'dogs kyi/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang / yongs su bsngos pa'o/ /zhes nga 'dogs so/ /de
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag
don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ ngo mtshar
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni/ gang lags/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun
sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas/ de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar

'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
bslab pa ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum brgya gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol bar 'dod
pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra

dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di yongs su tshol ba na ji ltar yongs su btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na lus la tshad char mi 'dzin/ srog la mi lta/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa
dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal pas yongs su btsal to/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs

kyi bu| shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /

bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi
bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de ltar song zhig /nang ngam phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ shar dang / lhor ma lta bar song zhig /nub dang / byang
dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams su'ang ma lta bar song zhig /rigs kyi bu/ ci nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang /
ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig /gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni/ rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /ci las
nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni/ 'khor ba la spyod do/ /gang 'khor ba la spyod

pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi thob bo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'ang skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin du bya'o/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni/ sems can thams cad la snang ba byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces smras pa
dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rtag tu ngu / legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
yang sgra thos te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal
bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta bu yongs su spong bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag
spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gag pa'i
chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya ba/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs
bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ston par 'du
shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dal ba phun sum
tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis

'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'o/ /khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya
bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang /
dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dge bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas 'grogs shing bstan pa dang / bsnyen
par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni/ thabs
mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni/ thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so/ /'di ni/ sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la
bsten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ gang la'ang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyi/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid
kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so so brtag par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par
byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi
lam lta bu/ brag cha lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la nges par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i

rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas
dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /zhes thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der

song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so/ /snyam nas des phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de smre zhing 'dug go /des
phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus
ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi
bskyed| nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi
ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan
gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par
'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so/ /zhes bya bar byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su
btsal ba de bzhin du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su btsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid du
song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang /
shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zhing du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang /
mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya ngag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer
kyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir ba rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing
tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad
las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa gzhan dang 'brel ba/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung
gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam

zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga'

mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang / chu ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do/ /chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa rin po
che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can de dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o/ /chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la/ dri zhim po'i ngad ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod
pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug

pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me
tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu da khebs shing me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag
thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser
po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do/ /

rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran+Da ba dang / bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de/
'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa
yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi gzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad
kyi tshad tsam yod pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang ba'i longs spyod du rtag tu

rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed

mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba
dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni/ gser las byas/ ngos gnyis pa ni/ dngul las byas/ ngos gsum pa ni/ bai DUR+Ya
las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni/ shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ni/ ke ke ru la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them skas them pa rin po che

sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzam+bu chu ba'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni/
me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing ngang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing

rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan+dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang
ldan no| |de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/
rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga'
zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/
dga' mgur spyod cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang gong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs
can bting ba/ stan snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar
chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing / sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par
byed de| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can de dag ni/ de ltar bur gus par byed cing /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ /de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong phrag mang
po| srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni/ lung nod/ la la ni/ kha ton byed de/ la la ni/ yi ger 'dri/ la la ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/
sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /rigs
kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ yun ring po
nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang
dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ des kyang sngon du da ltar khyod ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyin
mtshan du yid la byed la rgyun ma bcad par song zhig dang / ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na/ yid
la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis
nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi

gnas pa'i 'du shes pa bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams

cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma

rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams

cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang / tshig dang / 'bru sna tshogs bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
ming dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang / 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i
mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyis rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes
pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya
mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi
'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge
'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang
gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ nged kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/
ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ /nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di
dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba'am/ ldang bar bya ba'am/ byang chub tu spyad pa'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis

dang / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang /
yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya
ste| rigs kyi bu/ don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/ /khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin du
gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ /phang par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi dge ba'i
bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la bslab
bo| |rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyi/ des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zungs shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs
shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag
thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni/ gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzin pa/ bdag
gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyi/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste phyin nas de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gis ji lta bu'i
bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni/ dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru'am/
