dngul lam/ sa le sbram mam/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/ gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos
'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am/ rangs pa'ang mi skye'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam
du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o/ /yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad
de btsongs la/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa dag 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems
can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su nyo 'dod/ mi su nyo 'dod ces sgra bsgrags
shing skad kyis bos so/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par
'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/ sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o/ /snyam
nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su nyo 'dod/ su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba

de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nye ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus
btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni/ rnyed pa ngan pa
rnyed do| |snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs
su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bag ma par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po
brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i chad byad du mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi sa ma 'byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir
bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /kye ma nga ni/ bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs
la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gis lus nyo ba'ang ma
rnyed do| |snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la mis ni/ bya ba med kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo
mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do/ /
bdag gi lus ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu
dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rin du
ci 'dod pa sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu mtshan rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzugs so/ /brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu
rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o/ /snyam
nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i
khye'u 'di la bcings te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang
btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha'
yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun du bgo bsha' bya ba'o bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/ rigs
kyi bu| chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis
chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu
tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/ phye ma'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa
de khyod la sbyin gyi/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der
dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i
cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar yi
dam la brtan pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang
chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig /
rigs kyi bu/ khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa/ brgya byin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la stsol cig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ dam pa gzhan slongs shig /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu
ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /lha'i dbang po/ bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs bya'o/ /
lha'i dbang po/ bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig
ces byas pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par
spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu tshur shog /kho
mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags

de la'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig /bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang
lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i
slad du mchi'o/ /de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig /bu
mo/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag
nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo bar su'ang
ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ des nga ni/ lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i
gzugs su bsgyur te de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur stir bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i
phyir ro| |zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni/ nga mi 'dod de/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag
dang | rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no/ /zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug
nas khrag gzugs/ brla'i sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /snyam nas de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis
pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni/ dbul te/ nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do/ /zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod
pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o/ /zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis
te| rigs kyi bu/ des khyed la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag
kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni/ shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/
'di ni| chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i
phyir mi gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig /khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no/ /bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/ /bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o/ /gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med
pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o/ /zhes bgyis shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po sum brgya gzhi pa ste/ tha
ma| de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni/ gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi
khyab pa| 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod
nged kyis gnang gi /bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro yi/ nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye zhig /de nas bu mo
de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang

bar chad mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug
pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna
tshogs rnam pa tha dad bdag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te bu
mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi
ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta ba bas bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim bdun dang / ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis
yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs
khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa lags par byas pa mthong ngo / /de'i dbus kyi gzhi mod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong
ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni/ bdag gis mi cha'o/ /snyam nas de nas shing rta de
las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo
la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bkod pa chad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig
gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa
bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do/ /khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus

su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/
khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo

lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i
tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo / /lha'i sil snyan
dag kyang thos so/ /mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag
dang rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man+dA ra ba dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/
lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur
ba yin na/ khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni/ khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i
nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ kho bo cag gis
khyod la bstan par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas de dag gis me tog dang /
me tog phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng
dang | byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis gtor/ mngon par
gtor| mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs
pa zhig tu gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi
dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu
'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan
zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi
rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog
dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas shar phyogs ga
la ba de logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so/ /
snyam ste| des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni/ ma byung gi /gzhan du
na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris
so| |snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ khyed 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang /
grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gzugs de dag las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar btams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston
pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas
sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so/ /de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang
bar gyur to/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/ /de nas yang
bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur snyam nas rigs kyi bu/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun cu rtsa
gsum pa'o// //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so/ /
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa nyid la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin
pa de ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang
bral ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de
ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag
las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
ste| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas der chu btung ngo / /zhes de
dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ byang
phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu/ mi nyi mas gdungs shing byas pa'i rang bzhin
can| shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/ de la chu ni/ rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
byon pa'am bzhud par rtog go /gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya
ste| dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi sku'o/ /
rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid ni/ 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma
sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung pu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon
pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/
bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam
du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o/ /rmi lam ni/ rdzun te/ yang dag pa
ma lags pa'o/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag
de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/
de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis
pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong ba/ 'dong ba/ 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /
de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta
bu'o| |zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go /gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/
'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par mi rtog go /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
la nye bar gyur ba ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni/ 'jig
rten gyi sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams

dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med
par byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas byung ngo / /rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag
yod na| rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/ /rkyen de dag med na/ rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par
grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa
yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/ /de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen dag med na/ sku
mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten
nas 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten/
rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing
bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro
ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/
rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las
byung ba yin te/ de ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon te/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud
pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs

pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang
dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab
bo| |lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/
mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig
tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras
pa| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byin mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /
srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag
gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag
gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o/ /bdag ni/ the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa
de dang ldan pas ta la bdun du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur
sti bya'o| |snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas de'i sems sems kyis shes nas
de la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag byin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig /'di ni/ ngas khyod
yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur
bskal ba grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang
po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham ring
bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/ /des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /de nas
tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag kyang khyod la lus
'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ de
dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dag /khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam
pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo / /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi
rjes su mthun par 'jug go /khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu/
bdag ni/ 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba
byin te| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i sems de
lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar na/ chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di
lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur nas de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gis mi cha la/ 'di ni/ ma legs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma
byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / ro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam
ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams
na| bdag gis phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi
dbus su 'jug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /zhes grag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba
dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis
rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo / /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas ci nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang
mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
gi lus phug nas khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni/ rdul che ste/ 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'di ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni/ bla'i/ nus pa med
pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni/ cir yang ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag
gis sa phyogs der chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu
mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi dam

la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o/ /snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni/

ngo mtshar to/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa
phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
smras so| |rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni/ bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni/ byas/ chag chag ni/ btab na/ bdag gi me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig /ces des de la lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba khal stong byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni/ sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so/ /me tog kha cig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan pa ting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor
brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid
do| |chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams
cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa khengs pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rog gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu
med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag

pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /ri rab sna tshogs pa
nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do/ /nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do/ /gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /

sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid

do| |nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid

pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid

pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid

pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du reg par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i gting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang /

me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma

'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu

ngus de la sogs par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /

phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun

gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/

dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di nyid

dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams

cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/ tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /des mi khom pa thams cad ni/ spangs/ ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ bsgrubs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag
la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/
kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par

bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar ma'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnams pa mang po dag
gis bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni/ nga'i gdams ngag go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas

rim blo byas so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang / dad pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byas shig /kun dga' bo/ ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su
gtad do/ /rjes su yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/
de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa

dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/
mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang
ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes
bya ste| bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
pa'o||
empty page
